trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Birmingham
There were no other sightings in Birmingham on or around January 1st 1962
divs: sighting detailsi was approximately 4-5 years old when my mother wrapped me up in a blanket (it was very cold outside - winter) and took me outside our house. she held me in her arms and pointed up at the sky (towards the south). it was dark outside (night). there was a dark object with red and green lights hovering approximately 100 feet above us and approximately 100 feet south of our location. i remember her saying, "look! look!" she was terrified, which made me very upset. that is why the memory is so vivid to me. however, i cannot recall the shape of the object, although the bottom of it appeared to be dark gray\coal colored. it was hovering silently and moving very slowly to the northeast. after approximately 15 minutes, it moved out of the range of our vision. since this incident happened so long ago, i am reporting it solely for historical purposes.
Summary: dark shape in sky with red/green lights, hovering silently
